channel.title: Blogposts on The cloud architect's playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Blogposts on The cloud architect's playbook

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Every beginning is hard … So here I am with my own blog project. It came to me after I saw a video on YouTube about HUGO static websites and found it an exciting challenge. The video was several months ago, but who has time to take care of the project then? In the end, it was the Christmas holidays of 2022 that gave me the time I needed to take care of the blog.

item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.description: To be honest, this list is stolen, stolen from the original author of the TOHA theme I’m using for this site. Thank you for preparing this is, so I can use it as well @hossainemruz This is a sample post intended to test the followings: A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering. Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings.
